
mlboost
=======

About
-----
The mlboost library is an innovative machine learning library for
extreme prototyping.

Installation
------------
To install, simply run:

  easy_install mlboost
or 
  easy_install mlboost-x.y.z.tar.gz


Licence
-------

mlboost is distributed under the AGPL v3.


Authors
-------

Francis Pi√©raut is the original developer and current maintainer.
Yannick Gingras made the package easy_installable.
